actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide dental services in Veterans' Administration facilities to any veteran who was a prisoner of war for more than one hundred and eighty days.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to provide outpatient dental services to any veteran who while on active duty was a prisoner of war for more than 180 days.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide dental services in Veterans' Administration facilities to any veteran who was a prisoner of war for more than one hundred and eighty days.
